title: Behavior of __setattr__ and __getattr__ not consistent
body_html:
setattr will fall back and set the attribute of non-PyTorch attributes if it is not a parameter, etc.: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/module.py#L341

getattr does not fall back: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/module.py#L296
body_text:
setattr will fall back and set the attribute of non-PyTorch attributes if it is not a parameter, etc.: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/module.py#L341
getattr does not fall back: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/module.py#L296
body:
__setattr__ will fall back and set the attribute of non-PyTorch attributes if it is not a parameter, etc.: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/module.py#L341

__getattr__ does not fall back: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/module.py#L296
